text:
@Mike_Pence @realDonaldTrump @fema Can you please hold Kushner to account for confiscating our #PPE! I don't know if you are aware but nurses and physicians are dying. Please do not cause more Americans to die. When will you be able to honor your oath of office!
#COVID19
